Title: Relates to payments by a pharmacy benefit manager to participating pharmacies
Summary: Requires a pharmacy benefit manager to pay a participating pharmacy at minimum at the national average drug acquisition cost (NADAC) rate, or at the pharmacy acquisition cost rate if greater or there is not a NADAC rate, plus a professional dispensing fee that is at minimum the professional dispensing fee paid under the state medical assistance program.
LawCode: Amd ยง280-a, Pub Health L; amd ยง2911, Ins L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law and the insurance law, in relation to payments by pharmacy benefit managers to participating pharmacies
